name: KORK \u2013 Kingdom of Royal Knights (Canceled)
blurb: KORK - Kingdom of Royal Knights is a new CRPG under development by Noorcon Inc.

rewards.reward: The Kick-Starters: All pledges of $5 or more will receive a FREE DIGITAL COPY of the game upon completion of the project. The initial release will include the Windows, MAC and the LINUX computer systems.

The Enthusiast: All pledges of $15 or more will receive a FREE DIGITAL COPY of the game upon completion of the project. The initial release will include the Windows, MAC and the LINUX computer systems. You will also have access to the early BETA of the game.

The Super Enthusiast: All pledges of $20 or more will receive a FREE COPY of the game upon completion of the project. The initial release will include the Windows, MAC and the LINUX computer systems. You will also have access to the early BETA of the game. (Your Name Will be included in the Credits)

The Backer: All pledges of $50 or more will receive a FREE DIGITAL COPY of the game upon completion of the project. The initial release will include the Windows, MAC and the LINUX computer systems. You will also receive memorabilia of KORK upon the completion of the project. This will include Drinking Mugs; T-Shirt; Hoodies (Selection of one) - (Your Name Will be included in the Credits)

The Super Backer: All pledges of $75 or more will receive a FREE DIGITAL COPY of the game upon completion of the project. The initial release will include the Windows, MAC and the LINUX computer systems. You will also receive memorabilia of KORK upon the completion of the project. This will include Drinking Mugs; T-Shirt; Hoodies (Selection of one) - (Your Name Will be included in the Credits)

Master: All pledges of $100 or more will receive a FREE DIGITAL COPY of the game upon completion of the project. The initial release will include the Windows, MAC and the LINUX computer systems. You will also receive a copy of the game for the iPhone and iPAD when they have been completed in Phase II of the project. You will also receive memorabilia of KORK upon the completion of the project. This will include Drinking Mugs; T-Shirt; Hoodies (Selection of one) - (Your Name Will be included in the Credits)

Secret Master: All pledges of $500 or more will receive a FREE DIGITAL COPY of the game upon completion of the project. The initial release will include the Windows, MAC and the LINUX computer systems. You will also receive a copy of the game for the iPhone and iPAD when they have been completed in Phase II of the project. You will also receive memorabilia of KORK upon the completion of the project. This will include Drinking Mugs; T-Shirt; Hoodies (Selection of one) - (Your Name Will be included in the Credits). In addition your name will be forever embedded within the game as co-producer and co-sponsor of KORK! You will also get the chance to help develop one part of KORK\u2019s game play aspect.
